text_logic_form: Line $WP$ is the perpendicular bisector of line $AH$.
The measure of angle $WHA$ is $8q + 17$ degrees.
The measure of angle $HWP$ is $10 + q$ degrees.
The length of the line $AP$ is $6r + 4$ units.
The length of the line $PH$ is $22 + 3r$ units.

diagram_logic_form: Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $W$ and $A$.
Point $X$ lies on the line connecting $W$ and $P$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $H$ and $A$.
Point $X$ lies on the line connecting $H$ and $Q$.
line_instances: There are lines $WA$, $WH$, $WP$, and $WQ$ forming the figure.
There are lines $HA$, $HP$, and $HQ$ forming the figure.
